title: Control key doesn't work in game.
body: My control key works outside of game and I have level up ability assigned to ctrl + q/w/e/r. But it's like my ctrl key is disabled in game? I am so confused it was so random I didn't touch any controls.

replies.body:
So, you played the game and got used to using Ctrl+Q/W/E/R to level your abilities, and suddenly one game it's no longer working?

Do you also find that your normal right click is occasionally failing to move your champion? It could be that you have an accessibility option activated, which is keeping Ctrl held down/not held at all during the time you're pressing it.

Have you tried resetting your controls to their defaults? That should ensure it isn't a configuration issue. It doesn't take too long to reset your custom controls, especially if you note them down beforehand.

Do you have any third-party input software/drivers installed, such as a gaming software which allows you to customize the light on your mouse, etc.? Try disabling/uninstalling them and try playing again.
